title: Lithium aluminate flotation by pH- and light-switchable collectors based on the natural product punicine
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9353-9364

Ali Zgheib, Sophie Acker, Maximilian Hans Fischer, Jan C. Namyslo, Franziska Strube, Martin Rudolph, Ursula E. A. Fittschen, Annett Wollmann, Alfred P. Weber, Martin Nieger, Andreas Schmidt
Punicines were used as light-switchable collectors for flotation of the engineered artificial mineral lithium aluminate.
